thread.title: Real Time Economics: U.S. Tariffs on Hold? | Where to Find Inflation | Chavismo Wins, Venezuela Suffers

author: blogs.wsj.com
title: Real Time Economics: U.S. Tariffs on Hold? | Where to Find Inflation | Chavismo Wins, Venezuela Suffers
text: This is the web version of the WSJ’s economic newsletter. You can sign up for daily delivery here. Good morning! Today we look at the Trump administration’s mixed message on China tariffs, the United States’s two economies, software that shaves worker pay, the rise of U.S. bond yields, 13,000% inflation in Venezuela, and the dollar’s rally. TARIFFS Which Jobs Are Workers Most Willing to Move For? These Ones Next Financial Crisis May Have Hit '80s Generation the Hardest
